1.content: Let's start this out with a few choices.
1.title: Who Will You Choose?

11.content: Cory Baxter has always been overweight but lately he has been noticing his clothes have been getting a little uncomfortable so he decides to weigh himself last time he weighed 198 pounds this time he weighs.....
11.title: Cory Baxter

111.content:
220 lbs !! How did it have been able to arrive ? To understand he remembered what he had made last month.

----1 month earlier----

It was a typical day inWashington DC, the sun was shining the birds were singing, and Cory just got up and ready to get ready for school, he didn't really mind school.

When Cory was getting changed he had noticed that his jeans were getting tighter and his belly was a bit bigger than usual, he was struggling to get them on but to no avail, so he had decided on a pair of jogging pants. They still fit.

Cory want eat a breakfast, and a big one. But as he walked by his father's room, let's just say that his father was getting a little fatter as he sat down and Cory noticing his fat.

When he was downstairs, his breakfast was huge! There was pancakes, eggs, sausages, omlettes, toast, hashbrowns, and even cookies, and more!

So he grabbed a pancake and took a huge bite out of it! He was eating like a maniac, only taking him a minute to eat 5 pancakes! After his father saw him pigging out, he decided to join in the pigging out, he knew and Cory knew they couldn't eat all that food alone, so this had helped a bit, they both ate and ate for a while but Cory had to get to school so he finished up fairly quickly and went to school.
111.title: Eat some breakfast

choices: To ask Cory is he was joining Football
to invite Cory to a buffet
112.content:
The numbers rose to 245 pounds
"How have I gotten this fat...?" he asked,he then remembered his pigout session when his father was visiting Raven in San Francisco, it must have gone straight to his belly
He shook his belly and it bounced, shaking up and down as all the soft fat wobbled rapidly
Cory quite liked it, after all, he'd always been fat for his age, a few pounds more wouldn't hurt
He moved to the full length mirror and looked into it, his belly couldn't all fit into the mirror.
He smiled, and shook his gut again
Then the door bell rang and Cory picked up his T-shirt before putting it on and walking to the door, it was Newt


What did Newt want...?

choices: He is too fat for the t-shirt and is kicked off of the team due to his weight
He manages to squeeze into the t-shirt, but fails to compete in the football
1121.content:
"Hey, Cory" Newt greeted him, smiling
"Are you coming to football practice...?"
Cory thought about how he liked his belly, but how he wanted to be fit, perhaps he could have both
"Yeah, alright"
On the way to football practice, they stopped at a bakery and Cory stuffed his face with cakes, thinking "These have bread in them, and bread is good for me" Little did he know, they would go straight to his waist
The two of them reached football training and they were ushered into the changing rooms, and had a pep talk from the coach
Once the pep talk had finished that coach ordered them to try on the t-shirts they would be wearing, Cory had a bit of trouble

What happens next...?
1121.title: To ask Cory is he was joining Football

choices: Have a marathon of tv and eat for 10 hours strait
11211.content:
The coach looked at Cory he said with a sad look, in order for you to even think about joining this team you either gain 50 pounds or more, or lose 50 pounds your choice. If you can do just one of those you got a spot in the team. As Corey took of the tight shirt he wasn't sure what to do. Did he want to gain weight or lose weight. Gaining weight would be easy for him but losing would be tough so he left Nuwt at practice and went home to start gaining. His dad being a cook had tones of stuff in his pantry and fridge so he didn't have to worry about not having enough food.

How long should he eat for ~

11212.content:
Cory groaned, pulling the shirt over his head. It clung, tightly, to his gut.
He waddled out to the arena and partnered with Newt.
Newt threw the ball to him and he jumped for it. He felt his weight weigh him down and began to pant. Newt was red in the face too. Cory noticed that Newt had developed a gut and was puffing, trying, desperately, to regain his energy.

The coach blew the whistle and announced who had made the team, neither Cory or Newt had made the team. "Try again when you're not so fat," The coach informed them.

Cory and Newt waddled back to the changing room and changed back into their clothes. "Hey, Newt," Cory began, moving to Newt and slapping Newt's flabby gut. They were the only two in the changing rooms as they were the only two who were fat that had tried out for the basketball team.

"Yeah, Cory?" Newt asked, pulling at his trousers to get them to do up.
"You want to come back to the white house and clean out the fridge? Dad is away, visiting Raven in San Francisco, so, we're free,"

Newt looked up, finally clipping his trousers around his fattened gut and replied "...

Newts black studded belt was 2 holes looser than normal, while corys White belt was on the loosest hole. They then set off to corys house and when they got there theysat down in front if the fridge. 12.content:
When starts the story??


-On summer holydays


-On school period


-Another moment
12.title: Newton Livingston III

121.content:
Newton Livingston, a 5'4'' and 130 lbs boy, decided to head on over to his friend Cory Baxter on this nice saturday morning. He arrived in front of the White House (where Cory lived with his father Victor Baxter, the cook of the President of the USA) in his limousine that his mother (the United States Chief Justice) had lent to him. A shirtless Cory let him into the house and he stared at him for a sec. Cory had a big, soft buddah-belly, a big bubble butt, and his thighs mad him sort of waddle or strut when he walked.. Cory had just joined the football team and had been trying to buff himself up over the year but it seems to had been failing. Cory weight was increasing in the wrong way.

"What are you staring at, man?" Cory asked as they entered the living room. Cory belly looked soft and jiggled as he walked. They soon went to Jordan room and sat on the bed.

"Nothing man" Newt' said as Cory put a shirt on and turned on the television.

"Are you hungry'cause I am" Cory said.

Cory, then, headed downstairs with Newt following him as they went to the kitchen.

"So what do ya want to eat man" Cory asked to his friend.

"Oh, what you want" Newt said as he continued to still look at Cory and thinking that he must have put on 10 pounds in his belly at least. Newt went and sat down at the dining room table as Cory got them something to eat. Newt shouldn't be thinking too much about Cory's weight cause his pants had been getting tighter over the past couple of weeks. Newt knew he was getting a bigger and softer waistline.

"Here we go man" Cory said bringing in some chips and a whole chocolate cake.

"So man, you've changed your hairdue, you let it grow a little" Newt said always remembering Cory with short hair. Cory just smiled.

"My hairdue isn't the only thing that's changed and I know you've noticed it" Cory said.“Since school let out,” he replied, “I’m up 15 pounds!” He thumped his gut. “Fortunately, not all of my growth’s in my gut.” He went toward him and flexed a thick arm and simultaneously tensed his chest, causing his arm to bulge massively and his fat pec to shift and rose substantially. His shirt bulged noticeably as the fat layer over his muscles rose. “All that lifting’s been good for me. My chest’s up four inches.”He flexed a heavy thigh, causing his leg to bulge massively. His fat butt also shifted and makes the back of his shorts bulged noticeably as the muscles under fat layer bunch. “All that lifting’s been good for me,” Cory said, flexing his chest and his big arm. “Coach is always razing guys about having great chest muscles but no legs to carry them, no butt power to run and block with. So I’ve been emphasizing my ass and legs in the gym, and boy have I got butt power! My thighs are up to 6 inches! I’m actually faster in the 40 yard sprint than before I gained all this weight,” he added, slapping his blubbery belly. “Not bad, hey?”

“Sweet!” Newt said.

“Hey! You can sleep here, my father goes to San Francisco this afternoon to see my sister, Raven, so he will be not there during one or two weeks. So it will be “pizzas-sodas-TV“ all the week“ Cory said.

“Awesome!“ Newt answered.“I'll go fetch my clothes, you want to come?“
121.title: Newt and his best friend Cory.

choices: Buttoned but then burst open again

1211.title: Yeah!!

Try to find some larger pants
12111.content: He sucked it in as much as he could and tried to button them for a few minutes before going red faced and giving up he tried again sucking it in even tighter and they buttoned.His muffin top was splurging out all over then he exhaled and POP he was back to square one. So he decided to...
12111.title: Buttoned but then burst open again

choices: 2 burgers, large fries,  and a larger milkshake
121112.content:
Cory started to look for larger pants but was having trouble trying to find any that would fit him.

"Cory what taking you so long" Newt said coming into Cory room.

"Oh nothin Newt" Cory said pretending nothing was wrong.

"Well can you hurry I'm hungry" Newt said.

"You seem to be always hungry recently" Cory said picking up anthor pair of jeans.

"Yeah at least I'm not approaching 300 pounds" Newt said mad for some reason.

"Yeah well at least I'm not skipping gym class to much on chips and chocolate bars" Cory said knowing the Newt never knew that Cory noticed.

"How'd you know that" Newt said rubbing his larger belly hiden underneath his sweatshirt.

"Oh I know so how much weight yah put on 5 pounds" Cory said not realizing his best friend has put on 15 pounds in just a couple of weeks.

"No only 3 pounds" Newt said lying.

"Oh really, well that much, all it must be muscle right Newt" Cory said.

"Yeah it muscle" Newt said knowing that all 15 pounds are fat and more pounds just kept piling onto him it seemed. Newt would soon be in the 200's if he wasn't careful.

"Well that good, but do you want to help me with a diet I think I have realized i'vre gotten too fat" Cory said knowing he'd be to 300 pounds soon if he wasn't careful.

"Yeah I'll help yah lose weight Cory" Newt said hoping he could also lose weight at the same time.

"Well then lets go have my last fat meal then" Cory said laughing as he put on a pair of sweatpants. They went to there fav resturant DC Place and looked at the menu.

"So what are you getting Newt" Cory asked.

"Well something small" Newt said as the waiter came over.

"Oh the waiter coming we better make upour minds" Cory said looking at the menu more.

The waiter arrived at the table and took Newt order first and Newt ordered
121112.title: Off to DC Place

choices: Cory was exercising but Newt wasn't
1211122.content:
"Yeah I'll have 2 burgers, large fries, and a large milkshake," Newt said.

Cory raised an eyebrow to what Newt ordered, but he decided not to asked. "I'll have the same," Cory said waiter.

The waiter wrote the orders and went to the kitchen. After some time the waiter came with the food and the two starting eating. As they finished Cory decided to start exercising, and Newt said he would help.
1211122.title: Small Meal?

12111222.content:
when they got back to the white house, Cory and Next headed up to Cory's room, and Cory began exercising, Newt, however, didn't
Cory took his T-shirt off as he began sweating, this revealed his lareg 275 lbs gut, and man boobs
Cory began doing push ups, while Newt watched, as the fat on Cory wobbled as he exercised
"You not exercising Newt?" Cory asked
"No... i'm not" Newt replied, rubbing his stomach, the waistband on his trousers had gotten tighter, and was beginning to hurt
"Cory? Can i borrow your bathroom?" Newt asked
"Sure" Newt entered the bathroom, and pulled his trousers off "...Ah, that's better" Newt gave his stomach a rub "Cory wouldn't mind if i came back like this, he's to busy exercising" Newt left the bathroom, his trousers in his hand
Newt entered the room, and Cory looked up
"Man, looks like you've put on more than 3 pounds" he commented
"Yeah... i've gained about 15, i'll be in the 200's if i'm not careful" Newt replied
"Then why aren't you exercising?" Cory asked
"I don't want to" Newt replied
"Why? too fat?" Cory teased
"No, i am not!" Newt replied, slightly angry
"Come on, piggy, prove it" Cory teased again, stopping his exercise for a few moments and jiggling Newt's gut
"I am not a pig!" Newt snapped
"Really? Prove it, i challenge you to an exercise competition"
Newt thought for a few moments
What did he say?
12111222.title: Cory was exercising but Newt wasn't

choices: Newt wakes up and is heavier
Cory stops working out and eats
121112222.content:
"No thanks.... maybe another day." said Newt getting embarrassed and angry.

"Come on, Newt don't be such a chicken. What you don't think you could take it could you?" said Cory mockingly. Newt just blushed and looked away from his friend for a moment. "Come on man. Don't be such a wuss."

"Shut up! I said maybe another day!" Yelled Newt as he headed for the door with his trousers in his hand. He then got in his limousine and drove back home. There was no way he would stay at someones, who was trying to make him do something he didn't want to do, house. He just sat there in the limousine getting angrier and angrier about it. He put his trousers back on after all that he had became a bit embarrassed about his weight. On his drive back home he had stopped by DC place and gotten five burgers, six large fries, and three large milkshakes. His fight with Cory had fueled his anger.... as well as his appetite. When he got home he stuffed every last bit of the food in to his mouth in a furious rage. He was eating everything so fast as if any minute someone was going to come from the shadows and take it from him. Ketchup and grease stains fell on his shirt and he was making a royal mess out of himself. Once all the food was gone he went to his bed and fell asleep. Luckily, his parents had gone out of the country for their work.

During all of this Cory was at home attempting to work out. After every push-up he would think about Newt and how mad he had gotten because of Cory's comments. Every time he thought about it, he felt a bit depressed and had the strong urge to eat. So basically after every time Cory thought about Newt his mind would instantly go to food. He kept trying to suppress these urges of wanting to eat.
121112222.title: No thanks, maybe tomorrow

choices: Newt gets hungry and goes to eat lunch, Corey keeps working out
Cory decides to visit Newt and see how he is doing
1211122221.content:
Newt woke up in a slumber with his clothes from yesterday still on him. His trousers were hugging his ass tightly and his shirt was straining just to reach his belly button. Newt hadn't realized it yet but he was coming pretty close to hitting the 200 pound mark and even going beyond. His stomach growled furiously for some nourishment, so Newt decided might as well have some breakfast. Newt started to walk out his room and down to the kitchen. He had to go down a flight of stairs and on every step his belly would jiggle a bit, but it wasnt just his belly so would his moobs. This was surprising since just yesterday he hadnt had them, true his pecs werent toned but they didnt sag.

When he got to the kitchen he found himself a fresh box of instant pancakes. The box had said that it could make a total of 24 pancakes but Newt was hungry so he thought he would only make 12 pancakes. as he made each pancake he would stack them all up and cover them with whipped cream, powdered sugar, chocolate syrup, maple syrup, and cherries. He then began digging into them. Dropping pieces of whipped cream, chocolate syrup, or other foods onto his shirt. He got up and his stomach growled again but not as furious as before. Newt decided he might make a few more pancakes but when he picked up the box he noticed that it was empty.

"Had I eaten the whole box? I couldn't have." thought Newt and shrugged it off. He then decided to go in the fridge and take out some bacon and eggs. He unconsciously threw all the eggs and bacon into a pan when he thought he would just make 1 or 2 eggs and a few slices of bacon. He just ignored it and began to dig in as well. Newt stuck piece by piece of bacon into his face which was now getting a bit rounder and had the development of a double chin coming. He would shovel the eggs into his mouth as if he were an animal who didn't know how to use utensils. After all that gorging Newt was finally full and decided to go get ready for his day.

He threw on a shirt that he thought had fit him but was having trouble to cover his belly button. Every time he moved his belly button would peak out from under his shirt and reveal his ever expanding self. His new pair of small moobs also were being squeezed by the tightness of the shirt. He put on a pair of shorts that had been extremely hard for him to button. The button on them looked like they were about to fly off any minute. His butt were being chocked by his shorts and if you were behind him you could tell that he was getting bigger because every time his shirt rolled up the top of his butt would be sticking out of his shorts for everyone to see. His legs were being hugged tightly by each leg of his shorts and they looked like they could tear any minute. His arms had grown flabby as well and would jiggle a bit every time he walked as well as his belly.


As for Corey, he had stuck to his workout and never gave in to his urges during his workout yesterday. He had awoken from a nice slumber and got to his bathroom and started to get ready for the day. He took a shower and then went to go weigh himself. As the numbers flashed by reaching his previous weight of 293. He looked down but was having a bit of trouble ,as always, to see the numbers. As he looked he noticed he had lost a pound! After one day of exercise he had lost one pound of that massive gut that was hanging on to him. He was so happy to lose some weight he began jumping up and down which began shacking the whole bathroom.

"Oops.. " he said as he saw that somethings had been knocked over and fell on to the floor from him bouncing up and down. "Oh well its just the begging and soon I can jump as much as I want with no weigh pulling me down or jiggling!" he said with excitement. "Hmm what should I do today tho? Maybe I should go check up on Newt and see how he is doing, but I didnt do anything he just got mad and I also have gotta start to lose this weight?" he thought to himself.
1211122221.title: Newt's

With a loud bang, his wide black belt snapped off and hung loosely and uselessly through his belt loops. His larger belly had been straining his old belt, and exercising was contantly making it stretch as he bent over or squatted. He slid it from its belt loops, and took it back to his room. He then:

123.content:
Meena, Newt and Cory were relaxing in the backyard of the White House, looking at the stars. Suddenly, Meena pointed

out something flying in the sky. "Look guys!" she said, It's the star of Apollo!" "It only comes around once every 1000

years!". "Big deal." Cory said not caring.

"You don't understand, Cory!" Meena said. "This star grants wishes to only one person!"

Excited, the group closed their eyes and made their wishes. Then Meena asked: "So, what did you guys wish for?'

"Pfffft, I'm not telling and ruining my wish!" Cory said. "Well, what about you Newt?'

Newt was transfixed by the beauty of the star. Still looking at the star, he said out loud: "I wanna get fat..... Really, really fat." As soon as Newt said that, the star shined bright and rushed into the night.

"Why would you wish something stupid like that?" Cory asked.

"Because, I know it would never happen, dude." Newt said sadly

"Becareful, what you wish for Newt." Meena said patting Newt's flat belly. "You might just get it"

"I wish." Newt said
123.title: Apollo's star

1232.content:
Newt soon returned home where he turned in for the night.

The next morning, Newt woke up early in the morning. He got changed and head downstairs to see that his parents were gone and there were fresh made eggs and bacon on the table "Awesome!" he said as he grabbed the jug of milk from the refrigerator and sat down to eat his breakfast. When he finished the food in front of him, Newt didn't feel full, so he went to the cupboards and found a 12 pack of donuts which he ate every one of them.

Later at school during lunch, after Newt finished the first tray of foo, he went back to get more.

At night, Newt had one last large meal before he went to sleep.

As Newt changed to his night cloths he didn't noticed his small bulge belly.

In a few days...
1232.title: Unexplained Hunger

choices: Newt gets dressed and his clothes are a little tight on him.
Skip forward to school where Meena notices......
12321.content:
Newt woke up that morning feeling great. As he got up to stretch, he felt a tug on the front of his button up night shirt. All the buttons on his shirt have popped off and his belly was sticking out.. Where his flat, stomach used to be, now was a small paunch of flab.

"Huh?" Newt thought as he bent over to pick up the buttons on the ground. Then he heard a loud riiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiippp. His pj's had split in the rear.

Had his wish came true? Was he really fat? Newt rushed to his full size mirror and examined his body.

No, he wasn't fat. A little puffy. His shouldiers were broader, his cheeks were a little fuller, his belly was a little chunkier, and his butt was a little rounder.

"Mom! Mom! I grew last night!" he called. "My Pajamas burst!"

She came up to his room. "You ddin't grow overnight; those were always too small for you."

"They were?" Newt thought as he rubbed his expanding butt. "Mom, do I look.......different to you?"

"What?"

"I mean.....do I look fatter to you?"

"Well, actually......"

"What?"

"Maybe, I'll put skim milk in your cereal this morning."
12321.title: Not a few days; the next morning.

123211.content:
Newt went to his closet and grabbed a shirt and jeans, then he grabbed underwear and socks from his drawer. When Newt put the underwear on, he noticed that it was tight on him. But he went and put his jeans, he couldn't zip them up all the way nor could he button his jeans. So without wasting time Newt grabbed a belt and put on to keep his jeans on. Then he put on his shirt where it was tight around his new belly.

Newt went downstairs to see a bowl of cereal for him. As Newt was eating, he noticed the time and saw that he was going to be late for school. "Oh crap," he said as he quickly ate the rest of the cereal. As he was heading for the limo, he grabbed some more food to eat on the way to school.

At school, who was the first one to notice Newt?
123211.title: Tight cloths

choices: Skip to Gym class where Cory notices in the locker room

usually tight pretty boy face was looking a little fuller today. Meena spent the majority studying

Newt's face and only looked up when the teacher started to yell at her to pay attention. Meena

continued to watch Newt until her eyes finally rested on the tiny paunch that was hanging slightly

over his belt.

"The star's power's are true!" Menna realized. " I gotta tell Newt before he.....

The bell rang. Newt said bye to Menna. As he walked out, Meena glance at Newt's legs.

He usually wore his jeans a little baggy, but now they were tighter and they showed off his butt well.

Meena felt herself blush as she kinda had a thing for chunky guys.

"Hmm, maybe I should let Newt......develop more....before I tell him." She giggled.

"Of course, why do you think I put all this on my tray," Newt replied as he started to shovel the food into his mouth.

Cory and Menna watched in both amazement and grossed out as Newt shoveled every morsel of food from his tray to his mouth.

Menna wonders if she should tell Newt about the star's powers now.

info.brief_description: This is a weight gain interactive featuring Cory in the House.  Male weight gain only.
info.description:
Hello people. This is my first attempt at a weight gain interactive, so try not to judge too severly. This story is based on the Disney series Cory in the House. There are a few rules that I want people to follow:

Male weight gain only.

No sexual material I want to keep this clean.

No vore or inflation.

This is weight gain so no growing or any of that stuff.

No sudden gains, keep it natural or if magic is used keep the weight gain moderate at least.

Any method of gaining is allowed aside from the ones already prohibited.

And above all have fun!
info.pretty_title: Cory in the House Weight Gain Story
